original_text: For a whole week, they sat on the ground near Job. They knew that his pain was very bad. So all that time, they did not say anything to him.
korean_text: 밤낮 칠 일 동안 그와 함께 땅에 앉았으나 욥의 고통이 심함을 보므로 그에게 한마디도 말하는 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: they sat on the ground near Job
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 욥 근처 땅에 앉아 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: that his pain was very bad
they did not say anything to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 아무 말도 하지 않았습니다
